Rulings.Base: 1. The effect to Special Summon "Machina Soldier", "Machina Sniper", and "Machina Defender" targets all three of those cards.

PSCT.Tengu:
Ⓢ Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set.
Ⓢ Must be Special Summoned by "Commander Covington".
① You must pay 1000 LP to declare an attack with this card.
② You can send this card you control to the GY, then target 1 "Machina Soldier", 1 "Machina Sniper", and 1 "Machina Defender" in your GY; 
Special Summon those targets.
